CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Type__c,"Transfer"), IF(Production__r.Billing_Method__c == 'kWh', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Transfer__r.Transfer_Type__c,'Main') ,kWh_Amount__c != 0 ), IF(kWh_Amount__c < 0, -1, 1)*(ABS(kWh_Amount__c) - ABS(Production__r.Production_kWh__c)) /Production__r.Production_kWh__c, IF( kWh_Amount__c != 0, kWh_Amount__c /Production__r.Production_kWh__c, 0 ) ), IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Transfer__r.Transfer_Type__c,'Main') ,Amount__c != 0 ), IF(Amount__c < 0, -1, 1)*(ABS(Amount__c) - ABS(Production__r.Credits_Available_for_Allocation__c)) /Production__r.Credits_Available_for_Allocation__c, IF( Amount__c != 0, Amount__c /Production__r.Credits_Available_for_Allocation__c, 0 ) ) ) , 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The % effect of a detail record on the utilization of the parent production record. The difference between 100% utilization and reality. When all credits have been transferred, the sum will = 0. If credits are still outstanding, the sum will be negative.
CustomField.label: Change in Utilization
